entry.question: If I have a Leader on my team, who can I give the +3 ATK to?
entry.answer: You can only give one of your Leader characters the +3 ATK. If you have multiple Leaders, you can choose between them to receive this bonus.

entry.question: Can I play this card if I have no Leaders on my team?
entry.answer: Yes. You would only get the second ability then, as long as you have a Ranged character.

entry.question: Can I play this card if I have no Ranged characters on my team?
entry.answer: Yes. You would only get the first ability then, as long as you have a Leader character.

entry.question: If I have both a Leader and a Ranged character on my team, do I get both effects?
entry.answer: Yes. The card does not ask you to choose.

entry.question: Can I play this card if I have neither a Leader, nor a Ranged character on my team?
entry.answer: Yes, but it would do nothing.
